Posts.Content: Thanx George and Judith, I had appt yesterday with oncologist and he never mentioned it but I do remember at first meeting with oncologist to discuss treatment she did mention tamoxifen can cause osteoporosis, as you said 10 years is a long time and I would rather prevent it I have appointment with GP on Tuesday so will mention it, but I have a feeling she will say it down to oncologist to arrange it will keep you posted xxx Take care everybody xx
Posts.Title: bone scan question

Posts.Content: Hi Judith, spoke to nurses today at beatson and they are saying because I am premenopausal and n tamoxifen and not the other drug that I do t need bone scan once I am menopausel I will need one as I am on tamoxifen for 10 years, but I was positive I was told I would need one because of the tamoxifen, so just need to go with what iv been told. Take care Rosalyn xx
Posts.Title: bone scan question

Posts.Content: Hi Judith I am beginning to wonder if maybe no one has mentioned scan to me because I am on tamoxifen and not anastrozole and I am not menopausel, will ask tomorrow xxx
Posts.Title: bone scan question

Posts.Content: hi I just wanted to see if anybody can help with my question I am on tamoxifen for 10 years I have been on it since August, I have read a lot of people on here saying that they had a bone scan as the tablet can thin your bones, what I want to ask is when do you get a scan and who arranges it as I have been discharged from oncology even though I am getting herceptin till June next year, so don't understand why ive been discharged is this the normal practice  Rosalyn xxx
Posts.Title: bone scan question

Posts.Content: hi Judith and George, went to see my GP today re: bone scan, she saod she has not received any info crom oncology team about this, told her i was discharged from oncology and my next appt with breast team is next march, she said when i go to beatson on monday i have to ask the chemo unit about it so that what i will do. I am starting to wonder if you only get it with the other drug that a lot of ladies are taking instead of tamoxifen, just need to wait until monday xxx Rosalyn, hope everyone is well xx
Posts.Title: bone scan question

Posts.Content: hi Judith, i put a post on thursday to let you know about GP, o dont go to beatson for herceptin until tomorrow so i should find out then i hope, i am aslo going to ask about vitamins i can take to help me  when i asked before i was told not to take any  thank you for asking, hope youbare well will let you know outcome of tomorrow, take care. Rosalyn xxx
Posts.Title: bone scan question

Posts.Content: Hi everyone I am almost 2 years post WLE and lymphnode clearance my question is this is it normal to still have pain down side of my ribs breast and collar bone are really sore and sharp jaggy pains also my underarm is still numb just wondering of anyone else has this after such a long time. Hope 2016 is a great year kick add year for us all Rosalyn c
Posts.Title: is this normal???

Posts.Content: Hi everybody I wanted to ask if anybody had arm exercises that I can do, I have lost the sheet they give you after op, my shoulder down to my elbow and my shoulder blades are still really sore I can move my arm but limited and if I carry bags or do housework etc my arm is really sore and it still quite numb underarm even after 1 year, really grateful for any suggestions Hope everyone is good Rosalyn xx
Posts.Title: arm exercises

Posts.Content: Thanks Alison Will open the link and try them Rosalyn xx
Posts.Title: arm exercises

Posts.Content: I have been on antidepressant since 2011 after both my parents died 3 days apart I cldnt cope and I definitely think they have helped I take mirtazepine and think that is why I was so calm when I was diagnosed last year with BC, hope this helps xxx
Posts.Title: antidepressants

Posts.Content: hi joy, just wanted to let you know that my husband did the bowel.screening as bowel cancer in his family he done it just after knead diagnosed with breast cancer, it came back that there were traces of bloods and he had to redo it, so you can imagine the horror when he had to repeat, the second test he done came back absolutely fine, the same thing happened to his brother what I'm saying is try not to worry cause hopefully its nothing I know its easy for me to say that, but from experience moat people have to do two tests, take care xxx
Posts.Title: Failed mammogram and bowel screening in the same month!

Posts.Content: hi I know some ladies on here suffere like me with arthritis, I was on medication for this but when I was diagnosed with bc I was told to stop taking them, my chemo and radio have finished I am now getting tamoxifen and herceptin, my arthritis meds are sulfasalaside will I be able to start taking them again does anybody know please xxx
Posts.Title: tamoxifen and arthritis

Posts.Content: Hi I just want to ask when you take tamoxifen how long does it take to get aide effects? Xx
Posts.Title: tamoxifenside effects

Posts.Content: Has anybody got any idea how to get rid of this horrible taste I mouth, I had tax on the 6th and I have not been able to eat a thing everything disgusting I'm so hungry xxxx
Posts.Title: help please

Posts.Content: Thank you black panther I had first of 3 tax and herceptinon 6th June and I have been in hosp ever since I have neutropenic sepsis, I have appt wil onc next week and I'm refusing my last two tax my body can't cope and neither can I, iv had 3 fec 1 tax and been ill with every single one I know it only 2 left but mentally and physically I'm not strong enough and think the hosp knows that, but I will take dads and herceptin for the year then tamoxifen xxxx
Posts.Title: help please

Posts.Content: Hiya moonriz I have been taking them for 8 days and so far so good a bit achey but nothing compared to what some people have said just didn't know if it took a while to kick in before you get them, glad you are doing well on yours and hope it continues xx
Posts.Title: tamoxifenside effects

Posts.Content: hi black panther, think it normal foe you to feel like this u have been through a lot the reason i answered u was firstly to say well done for finishing treatment and dont too hard on yourself, secondly I wanted to ask y u ended up in hospital what were symptoms, the reason I ask is I start docetaxel next week and I had a horrific time on FEC was hospitalized u name it I had, so would appreciate knowing your experience don't hold back lol xx
Posts.Title: My story and some advice please

Posts.Content: Thanx, u not scaring me I just like to know what I'm in for I have read a lot of ladies experiences with tax and it really scared me but they had a not to bad time on fec, all symptoms u got with tax I got with fec except high temp, I was dehydrated, sickness chest infection and just wanted to die coukdnt cope I'm hoping that this cycle will b ok but I doubt it lol if o don't get on touch after u know it floored me xx
Posts.Title: My story and some advice please

Posts.Content: Thank you Karh and Dorothee, I had an idea that was what it was but since having bc my mind goes into overdrive it never used too lol xx
Posts.Title: sore head and bleeding nose

Posts.Content: Hi am 11 days past last chemo and  have had really bad pain all over but my head is really sore and today my nose started bleeding, I know after my first tax I had nosebleed for three days and was told its the chemo has anybody else had this, thanx xxx
Posts.Title: sore head and bleeding nose

Posts.Content: Sorry for butting in to conversation but I didn't know this either does anybody have the number xx
Posts.Title: dla.

Posts.Content: hi everyone well I did it I never ever thought I would say that as I had such a horrible time with every cycle, just want to say thank you to all you lovely people that told me not to give up as I was ready to throw the towel in after number 4 but yous gave me the inspiration to go on and it finally over, just have herceptin and rads to go and the tamoxifen ( bit worried about this as I didn't know u got side efftexts from this tablet until I read some posts) so thank you all so much, xxx
Posts.Title: last chemo!!!!!

Posts.Content: hi sorry to be on moaning about this again but I had my first tax with herceptin iv 2 weeks I ended up in hospital for 10 days with neutropenic sepsis o was really ill, my 5 tax and herceptin due next Friday but I don't want to do tax as I am really scared I end up ill again it was horrible ans I know all the ladies are coping with it too but I can't do it, I have heard a few people on hear saying ask for it to b reduced does anybody know what that means and does it alter side effects xx
Posts.Title: dosetaxel

Posts.Content: Thank you so much everybody I'm just a scaredy cat lol I hate feeling as if I haveno control and that is exactly how I feel o wish I was stronger to deal with this but I go to speak to my onc on Wednesday and another thing is the oral thrush it is that bad that my tounge all swells and I can't wat or drink iv not ate for 11 days with this horrible taste in mouth everything disgusting thanx everybody xxx
Posts.Title: dosetaxel

Posts.Content: hi willow, so sorry you have had a bad experience. I live in Glasgow and i can honestly say my treatment from surgery to chemo to radio has been forst class, my chemo and radio were given at the Beatson and it was excellent care im still geyting radio thereyhey make a very scarey experience pleasant and i honestly cant fault any songle part of my care.  Hope you get on ok with the rest of your treatment. Rosalyn xxx

Posts.Content: Hi Judith I was reading your reply there my radio finished end of Sept and I never had a bone density scan and no one mention it to me, I am also still getting herceptin IV and on tamoxifen does everybody get the scan?  Xx
Posts.Title: immune system

Posts.Content: Thank you Judith I will ask my Onc next month when I see him but I'm not in menapause yet although I do think its starting maybe that why I never got it but will ask the question xxx
Posts.Title: immune system

Posts.Content: Hi everyone My daughter Danielle ran the race for life this morning in Glasgow and she raised over 500 pound, I went to the see her at the finish line, last year she done orbit I was so ill with chemo I couldn't go, it was very emotional and I cried with pride as she finished, its a hard day but also a very humbling day watching all those people so glad I went and I am so proud of her. Just wanted to share a wee bit of joy Hope everyone is well Rosalyn xxx
Posts.Title: Race for Life

Posts.Content: Hi aromamum yes its next march x
Posts.Title: lump under arm update

Posts.Content: Hi ladies I went and got the lump under my other arm checked yesterday, typically the lump disappeared but bcn felt it and said she didn't feel anything told her left boob really sore but she didn't seem concerned she never have me a mammogram or ultra sound so suppose she knows what she looking for and I will just go with what she said xxx
Posts.Title: lump under arm update

Posts.Content: Hi I too get herceptin but I get IV drip, after my fourth chemo I was sent for a scan as the function had dropped by 10% that was in July and the nurse said to me I will see you in October u need to have these every 3 months, I said to my chemo nurse last week about it and she said I'm just going to leave u until December after your 10th herceptin, but surely if u have to get them regular they can't just decide not to send u xxx
Posts.Title: Heart echo scan

Posts.Content: Hi Jane no i never got October one when I asked she said my function was 71% in July so she wasn't sending me until Decemberbut I will have had 6 more herceptin then I just think its a bit long I will give her a call, thank you for reply xxx
Posts.Title: Heart echo scan

Posts.Content: hi everyone, can anyone tell me if it ok to take senna tablets if your on tamoxifen, hope you are all well Rosalyn xxx
Posts.Title: senna tablets

Posts.Content: Evening lovely people I have a wee question and it is do you think it would be ok to put extensions in the hair? I have a full head of hair very short and curly and its just not me I hate wearing my wig but I won't go to work without it as I hate my own hair, my hair used to be shoulder length and blonde, now its horrible I'm not a vain person but I just don't feel like me and nobody seems to understand that, even if my hair got to chin length I would be ok with that I just can't cope with that wig anymore it really hurts my head, so was considering getting extensions and just wondered if anyone else has had it done. Thanx Rosalyn xxx Keep well everyone x
Posts.Title: hair extensions

Posts.Content: Thank you bonbonlarue, will see hairdressers this week xx
Posts.Title: hair extensions

Posts.Content: Hi Amanda  I started tamoxifen last August, think it comes down to the brand you take moat ladies on here and myself take wockhardt brand it seems to be the moat tolerated. Although I think every brand has same side effects, o do get really bad achy joints unused Fontana it every morning, I then switches to night time but the night sweats were awful so I switched back to morning, I do go get the odd flush during the day but nothing compares to night sweat. I have not had any sickness on this tablet, so I would definitely take it in the morning but that just me all you can do is try what works best for you. Hope this helps Rosalyn xx
Posts.Title: Taking Tamoxifen

Posts.Content: Hi everyone iv not been on in a while and I have a bit of a dilema My chemo finished last July and herceptin finished this June, last year during chemo I ended up in hospital for 3 weeks as I was sepsis, any way git over that. Last week I wasn't very well got sent to hospital and was told I was neutropenic sepsis againi was totally gobsmacked after 7 days of iv antibiotics it wasn't coming up was .4 they stopped my tamoxifen and it rose to .9 and I did start to feel better. I hot home yesterday with oral antibiotics and was told to start taking tamoxifen again, well since I started to take it again I feel really unwell again, and I am beginning to think it is the tamoxifen that is causing it. I can't go on like this feeling so rubbish thought it was all behind me when chemo stopped I am really considering just stopping tamoxifen and just wondered if anyone had experienced this. Thanks for listening hope you are all well. Rosalyn xx
Posts.Title: tamoxifen and neutropenic sepsis

Posts.Content: Thanks Julia Yes I have infection but neutrophils were lowered due to tamoxifen yes it can be a aide effect I havebeen taking it nearly 1 year now not had many side effects but the past month every bone in my body aches and I have been really unwell, the oncology think I have been taking to long for it to get this bad now, but I am just so done in with it all constantly feeling unwell,after fighting and coming through all that chemo to not feel any better, I'm just wondering if its worth it. Rosalyn x
Posts.Title: tamoxifen and neutropenic sepsis

Posts.Content: Maggie- may I totally agree with you if your life is that bad and you don't want to be here don't involve other people all those poor school kids its disgraceful. X
Posts.Title: why?

Posts.Content: hi I had tax on Friday and have same symptoms as everybody else, but I am just back fro Gp who gave me tramadol which I'm a bit scared about taking but he said my throat is very inflamed because of the chemo and if it didn't get better would need to admit me but do t know why as he never gave me anything for my throat has anybody else else experienced this please xxx
Posts.Title: sore throat

Posts.Content: hi everybody hope everyone is well, I have a question I would like to see if anyone else has had this experience. I have just finished week 2 of my rads and my boob is really tender and sore just at my scar and ribs and across the side to nipple, my skin is not red or broken just really sore, has anyone had this happen? Thanks and hope you all have a great weekend Rosalyn xxx
Posts.Title: rads and pain!!!

Posts.Content: Hi Sandi please don't worry about rads it is nothing compared to everything else you have been through, as long as you keep applying the aqueous cream you will be fine maybe a wee bit hot but fine and not everyone has pain but its a pain you can deal with easy it not excruciating pain please don't worry its a doddle xx
Posts.Title: rads and pain!!!

Posts.Content: Hi Denise, I mentioned it to them today I'm not red or burnt so thats a bonus but told them it was really sore to touch and was swollen they said that can happen, o am having a review tomorrow so will mention it to doc, but nurses don't seem to bothered about it, hope you sail through the rest of yours xxx
Posts.Title: rads and pain!!!
